definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗

sentences.english: The second part makes a historical retrospection of the Agricultural Cooperative Movement.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分回顧了五十年代農業合作化運動的歷程。

sentences.english: Thirdly, cooperative road is the only road for China's rural development.
sentences.chinese: 合作化道路是中國農村發展的必由之路。

sentences.english: All the old trades have been cooperativized.
sentences.chinese: 所有的舊行業都被合作化了。

definition: collectivization of agriculture (disastrous policy of communist Russia around 1930 and China in the 1950s)
fixing of farm output quotas for each household

definition: to nationalize/to take over as communal property
rural household contract responsibility system, PRC government policy linking rural income to productivity
